metadata.title: Send incident Teams Adaptive Card with XDR Portal links
metadata.description: This playbook will send a Teams adaptive card with incident and entity information with all links pointing to the security.microsoft.com portal
metadata.prerequisites: A Teams account to be used to send Teams adaptive card notification (The user account will be used in Teams connector and must be a member of the channel you wish to send messages to.
postDeployment:
**1.Configure connections**
Edit the Logic App or go to Logic app designer.
From the toolbar click *Connections* and Expand *Microsoft Teams*.
Create a new connection or click the link to edit the existing connection and signin.
Note:  Cards sent with this playbook will use the account that creates connection.
Run the PowerShell script found in detailed instructions to Grant API Permissions.
**Attach the playbook**
Attach the playbook
